availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry W. Wilkes (Jefferson County, Kentucky, wire dealer)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, wire dealer. England native. Married to Eliza C. Leslie Wilkes in Harrison County, Indiana, on February 24, 1832. Father of Henry W. Wikes, Jr., Alfred Wilkes, Albert Wilkes, and Emma Wilkes. Wire dealer in Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1860. Wire dealer in Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1861. Wire dealer in Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville District 4, p. 104-105.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 7, p. 63B.
